item.title: Disarming Honesty
item.description: Maybe this section is just about being credible, honest, and having integrity. An introduction to that. They are powerful in and of themselves. Just do it that way. Don’t be a schemer.

item.title: Edit for Specificity
item.description:
“Details lend a sense of reality to even the most preposterous statements.”

After you write your copy, go back through and make it more specific.

item.title: Exclusivity, Rarity or Uniqueness
item.description: Also it’s just about them feeling special. Make them feel special by offering them something only a few get to take advantage of.

item.title: Extra Stuff
item.description: Timing. It can make or break. Gotta have good timing.

item.title: Familiarity
item.description:
My ex-wife used to watch this chick on YouTube.

My story here is to talk about the BTB folks. They’d call email whatever. Happy trumpeting. We developed community. It was easy to sell to those folks and they referred their friends. Maybe I should start saying this to my students.

item.title: Fear/The Stakes
item.description:
• FOMO
  • Fear of crime
  • Fear of death
  • Fear of aging
    • Fear of not being able to bang
    • Fear of not being attractive
  • Fear of losing money

Use fear careefully in response to some perceived danger or lossthat one might have to face (What’s at stake?)

item.title: Guilt and Reciprocity
item.description:
Reciprocity… This might go somewhere else. It ties into guilt.

Give them something.

  • Information
  • Entertainment
  • Repeat mailings
  • Repeat lumpy mailings

“In reply I want you to know who I am.”
